body.name: AIRHUG 3 in 1 Webcam - 1080P Webcam with Microphone and Speaker, USB Webcam with Privacy Cover, for Video Conferencing/Online Class/Game Live
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 16 hrs 1 min
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 22 hrs 1 min
features: Excellent 1080p Video - AIRHUG 16 webcam with microphone and speaker delivers high-quality video with a resolution of 1080p and at a fluid 30fps at all image resolutions. With 2.07 million pixels and support for online meetings and video chatting, The all-in-one camera also features automatic white balance, a FOV of 76°, and fixed focus. Ensuring that you always look your best during video conferences and meetings.

Clear Audio and Volume - AIRHUG 16 video conference camera is equipped with a powerful speaker and high-quality microphone, making it easy to conduct meetings with multiple people in the room. Great 5W speaker with a maximum volume of ≥ 90dB that delivers clear and loud sound. This ensures that everyone in the room can hear clearly, even in noisy environments or a large conference room. It is perfect for 3-5 attendend conference.

Basic Microphone Feature-AIRHUG 16 all-in-one camera has only 1 microphone which can pick up human voice wthin distance of 6ft. With a sensitivity of -38dB, SNR of 65dB and automatic gain control which ensures that other side can be hear your voice clearly. AIRHUG 16 Provide geat conference experience for participants. It good for online lession, remote conferences, video chatting or etc. AIRHUG 16 is compatible with all major video conferencing platforms such Zoom,Skype,Teams and so on.

Portable Design - The AIRHUG 16 All-in-one video conferencing camera has a compact size (5.5 inch length, 2.8 inch width, 2.3 inch height) ,and the weight is 5.9 oz. Easy to take it anywhere. USB webcam AIRHUG 16 features universal clip that fits to laptops, desktops, computers, mac, pc, lcd monitors,curved screen. You can place AIRHUG 16 with vertical shape way on the conference table for using. Also you choose a webcam tripod clip for the webcam meeting multi-angle needs.

Easy to set up - AIRHUG 16 webcam with microphone and speaker comes with a privacy cover to ensure your privacy and security. Easy to connect PC and laptop notebook etc via USB cable no need any extra driver. It supports for operating system including Windows 7, 8, 10, 11,Mac OS system.The packing includes an AIRHUG 16 all-in-one camera, Type C core cable, user manual, and warranty card. AIURHUG 16 is the perfect solution for your video conferencing needs.

What is in package？ The package includes AIRHUG 16 Webcam x 1, USB C to USB C Cable x 1, USB C to USB A Cable x 1, User Manual x 1. How can I get Mini tripod？ There are AIRHUG 99 and ARHUG 98 tripods but which need to be purchased. Please search ASIN B0C7QDJ2CX and ASIN B0C7MKTG2X. Can you change the camera orientation back and forth between landscape and portrait? AIRHUG 16 webcam can not change the camera orientation back and forth between landscape and portrait.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This webcam/microphone/speaker combo works great, and and is easy to connect and use. It can be configured vertically or horizontally depending on your needs. No issues to report. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Rather big but has everything in one package
reviews.reviewText: This Airhug camera has practically everything you need for a video call. As most cameras come with only a microphone, this one comes with a speaker too, making it a complete package for a video call. Having said that, this speaker makes it a bigger package than I have expected. It definitely has a presence on the desk which I like less. It also comes with a little tripod as a second option to the monitor mount flap.It looks like the intention behind the design was a compact traveling kit, which I kinda don't get since if you are traveling you are with a laptop that has everything built-in already.The quality for all feature is very good.The privacy shutter is a great addition.Over all, it's a good product, just a little big.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile, portable, high-quality camera, mic, and speaker combo. Great for traveling professionals.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this portable communications/video conferencing solution from AIRHUG. It is lightweight and compact but well made. I often see camera/microphone combinations, but rarely do I see an embedded speaker as well. This device produced great quality pictures and sound. The microphone also picked up sound well without any distortion. It has a built-in privacy cover, and it comes with a handy, two-piece tripod. It connects via USB A to USB C or USB C to USB C adapter cables both of which are included. The whole system including, camera, tripod, and cables, fits easily into the included carrying bag. This is the type of technology I would depend on and use frequently as a travelling professional. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT include stand
reviews.reviewText: Misleading video makes it appear that a stand or tripod comes with the camera but it does NOT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Video Quality and Obvious Shutter
reviews.reviewText: Per my son:This is a good value for At-home workers and gamers. It has a decent video stream, though that is always subject to lighting. Certain lightbulbs and environments can cause a strobing effect. The very big and obvious shutter is the best feature to me personally, big red circle making it very clear the shutter is closed. and large green recording light. This is a must for privacy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The Webcam That Has Everything You Need for Video Conferencing, Online Classes, and Game Live!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the AIRHUG 3-in-1 Webcam so that I'd have a webcam for video conferencing and online classes.Here are some of the things I like about the AIRHUG 3-in-1 Webcam:It's 1080p HD. The webcam has 1080p HD resolution, which means that my video looks crystal clear.It has a microphone and speaker. This means that I can hear and be heard clearly during my video calls or meetings.It has a privacy cover. This cover can be closed when I'm not using the webcam, so I don't have to worry about my privacy.It's easy to set up. The webcam is very easy to set up and use.It's affordable. The webcam is very affordable, especially considering all of the features that it offers.Here are a few things I don't like about the AIRHUG 3-in-1 Webcam:The microphone can be a bit sensitive. The microphone can pick up background noise, but this can be easily fixed by adjusting the microphone settings.The speaker is not the best quality. The speaker is not the best quality, but it's still good enough for most purposes.Overall, I'm happy with the AIRHUG 3-in-1 Webcam. It's a great webcam for video conferencing and online classes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Decent camera kind of big and bulky tho.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This works great!
reviews.reviewText: This works great! I am pleasantly surprised due to it being an "off-brand". The camera quality was fairly nice. Don't get me wrong, it's not like crystal clear, but there are not many webcams that are crystal clear. It is very good quality when meeting with people online. It is as clear as any other webcam I have used. i like the "mute" feature where you can slide a cover over the camera lens for added confidence and security. The speaker works well too. I had no trouble hearing the person on the other side. Setting up is very simple. Once I plugged it into a USB slot, my computer immediately recognized it and I was able to use it right away in my meeting software. Also, it basically sits on top of my monitor and is supported by an adjustable flap on the back. It doesn't actually grip onto the monitor as I thought it would, but it rather uses the flap to fight against gravity and keep the camera from tipping off, if that makes sense. You also have the option to place it on the desk or wherever. You can also place it vertically if needed. It's very versatile. It also comes with a mini tripod which is a nice feature/option. I think this competes with the name brands on the market.
